thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stay here for the ideal Paris trip
thread.title_full: Stay here for the ideal Paris trip - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Eric C
title: Stay here for the ideal Paris trip
text:
Your day starts with the breakfast in the lobby with eggs, bacon, sausage, yogurt, baked items and control of an advanced espresso/coffee machine to get your morning coffee the way you like it. Then go over to the friendly English-speaking front desk for your museum/event tickets, maps, dining advice, etc, and have a nice walk to the many many brasseries, cafes, crepe makers, shops right there in the Latin quarter which is fun, safe, more affordable and kinda bohemian. Uber works fast and friendly everywhere, too! The rooms are small but comfortable and the shower is hot and has plenty of pressure. OK a real review has ideas for improvement and that would be to use less carpet freshener but when asked they complied and stopped using it in our room.
Room Tip: Discuss this with the staff. See more room tips
